presentationColumns.name: Delay Perf % (0=Ontime,  >0=Late)
presentationColumns.description: Index of Arrival delay expressed as Percentage of Air time. If Air time = 100 and Arr delay = 5, Perf = 5%

presentationColumns.name: # of Late Flights
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:X0 - Airlines.Flight Facts.# of Late Flights

presentationColumns.name: % of Sch Fl Within 30 Min Late
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:X0 - Airlines.Flight Facts.% of Sch Fl Within 30 Min Late
presentationColumns.description: Percent of flights that arrive on time. Note: If you select Origin as a category, you get percent of flights that depart from those airports and arrive on time.
alternateNames: % of Sch Fl Arr Less than 30 Min Late
% of Sched Fl Arr Less than 30 Min Late
% of Sched Fl Within 30 Min Arr Delay

presentationColumns.name: % of Sch Fl Over 30 Min Late
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:X0 - Airlines.Flight Facts.% of Sch Fl Over 30 Min Late
presentationColumns.description: Percent of flights that arrive on time. Note: If you select Origin as a category, you get percent of flights that depart from those airports and arrive on time.
alternateNames: % of Sch Fl Arr Over than 30 Min Late
% of Sched Fl Arr Over than 30 Min Late
% of Sched Fl Over 30 Min Arr Delay

presentationColumns.name: Avg Delay per Pax-K-Miles (Min)
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:X0 - Airlines.Flight Facts.Avg Delay per Pax-K-Miles (Min)

presentationColumns.name: -- Delay Catchup during Flight ----------------
presentationColumns.description: Percent of flights that arrive on time. Note: If you select Origin as a category, you get percent of flights that depart from those airports and arrive on time.

presentationColumns.name: % Delay Increase After Dept
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:X0 - Airlines.Flight Facts.% Delay Increase After Dept
presentationColumns.description: % increase of delay after departure. If plane left 10 min late and arrived 15 min late, % increase = 50%

presentationColumns.name: Diff Arr - Dept Delay
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:X0 - Airlines.Flight Facts.Diff Arr - Dept Delay
presentationColumns.description: Difference in minutes between Arrival and Departure delay. If plane left 10 min late and arrived 15 min late, difference = 5.

presentationColumns.name: Ratio Arr to Dept Delay
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:X0 - Airlines.Flight Facts.Ratio Arr to Dept Delay
presentationColumns.description: Ratio of Arrival dealy in minutes divided by Departure Delay. If plane left 10 min late and arrived 15 min late, ratio = 1.5.
